A Souvenir of the Opera
Peniel Farm, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK Cornet L. Manhire Greensplat Silver Trombone J. Clift Falmouth Town Euphonium W. Prowse Penzance Horn A. Merrifield Penwithick Silver Best Player J. Clift Falmouth Town
The best player award raises a question - both the WEBF website and BBN 9/1929 independently list the 12 bands shown, not including Falmouth. Did J. Clift dep for a different band? Was the award made from a solo contest?
